mapper.select: SELECT EMAIL FROM TUM_PROJECT WHERE PJ_ID=#{pj_id}

SELECT NAME, profile_simg, MSG_CONTENT, TO_CHAR(MSG_DATE, 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS') MSG_DATE, MSG_CHECK FROM TUM_MESSAGE MSG, TUM_MEMBER M WHERE CHATROOM_ID=#{chatroom_id} AND MSG.EMAIL = M.EMAIL ORDER BY MSG_DATE ASC
SELECT DISTINCT(MSG.PJ_ID), PJ_TITLE, NAME, PROFILE_SIMG, PJ_ADDR FROM TUM_MESSAGE MSG, TUM_MEMBER M, TUM_PROJECT P WHERE MSG.PJ_ID = P.PJ_ID AND P.EMAIL = M.EMAIL AND CHATROOM_ID = #{chatroom_id}

SELECT EMAIL FROM (SELECT CHATROOM_ID, EMAIL, MSG_CONTENT, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY CHATROOM_ID ORDER BY MSG_DATE DESC) AS RECENT_MSG FROM TUM_MESSAGE WHERE CHATROOM_ID=#{chatroom_id}) WHERE RECENT_MSG = 1
mapper.update: UPDATE TUM_MESSAGE SET MSG_CHECK = 'Y' WHERE CHATROOM_ID=#{chatroom_id}
mapper.select: SELECT MSG_TYPE, PJ_ID, EMAIL_STARTER FROM TUM_MESSAGE WHERE CHATROOM_ID = #{chatroom_id} GROUP BY MSG_TYPE, PJ_ID, EMAIL_STARTER
SELECT NAME FROM TUM_MEMBER M, TUM_PROJECT P WHERE P.EMAIL = M.EMAIL AND P.PJ_ID=#{pj_id} GROUP BY NAME
